item.title: Mercedes-Benz LS 1938 v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | July 14, 2025

Mercedes-Benz LS 1938 v1.0 ETS2

The 1938 Mercedes-Benz LS is one of the German automaker’s most iconic classic trucks and is beloved by the Brazilian Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2) community. As a mod, it attempts to recreate the essence of this beast that marked an era on the roads.

Main Features of the 1938 Mercedes-Benz LS Mod in ETS2:
1938 LS mods generally stand out for:
Detailed Modeling: The semi-forward cabin and robust lines of the 1938 are well reproduced, with attention to visual details, both exterior and interior.
Chassis Variations: It is common to find 4×2 (the stump) and 6×2 (the truck) chassis options, allowing for different configurations for transporting loads.
Realistic (or Improved) Engines and Transmissions: The mod typically offers engines that simulate the original 1938’s power (380 HP), as well as “chipped” or more powerful options (such as 449 HP, 476 HP, and even 510 HP), and various transmissions (ZF 16S165, among others) to adapt to different play styles.
Authentic Sound (FMOD): One of the highlights is the engine sound, which aims to replicate the characteristic Mercedes-Benz roar, often with “direct” roars and custom horns that increase immersion.
Many Customization Options: This is one of the biggest draws. You can customize almost everything:
Exterior: Various bumper variations (including the famous “mustache”), fog lights, front grilles (new and old), deflectors, sun visors (with or without logo, editable), wheel arches, antennas (PX, front and rear), rear mudguards (original, paintable, editable), exhausts (original and straight chrome), fuel tanks (original plastic and stainless steel), and original MB wheels.
Interior: PX radio, curtains, cabin lights, CD player in the dashboard, bed variations, control panel (with or without wheel arch gauge), and other cabin accessories compatible with the SCS accessories DLC.
Paints and Skins: Possibility to apply several skins from real companies or create your own with editable templates.
Standalone: The truck is independent in the game and can be purchased at a Mercedes-Benz dealership, a used car dealership, or the mod shop.
Compatibility: Frequently updated to be compatible with the latest versions of ETS2 (1.51, 1.53, 1.55, etc.).

Where to Find the Mod:
The popularity of the LS 1938 means it can be found in a variety of locations. The most common are:
Brazilian Modders’ YouTube Channels: Many content creators such as Fernando Gamer, Cristhian Cardoso, RBZ Mods, Cláudio Gamer Oficial, among others, develop and publish versions of the LS 1938, usually with download links in the video descriptions.
ETS2 Mod Sites: There are several websites specializing in ETS2 mods that compile and make these trucks available.
Steam Workshop: Some creators make their mods available directly on the Steam Workshop, which makes installation and updating easier. However, it’s important to check compatibility with your game version, as not all mods are constantly updated there.
Always prioritize downloading mods from trusted sources to ensure the security of your files and the stability of your game.
Have you ever had the chance to drive a 1938 LS in real life or in-game? It’s a truck that evokes a lot of nostalgia for transportation lovers!

Credits: antony

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: 1620 Borges Batateiro v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | July 14, 2025

1620 Borges Batateiro v1.0 ETS2

The Mercedes-Benz 1620 “Borges Batateiro” in Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2) is a truck mod that has become quite popular in the Brazilian community. It pays homage to a real-life trucker known as “Borges Batateiro” (or sometimes “Cabelo Batateiro”), who became famous for his truck configurations and customizations, especially Mercedes-Benz models.

Features of the 1620 Borges Batateiro Mod:
This mod aims to replicate the style and configurations that were characteristic of Borges Batateiro’s trucks, typically including:
Visual Customization: The highlight is the customization options that evoke Brazilian style, such as:
Distinctive Grille: Often with the original 1620 grille or with some modifications.
Modified Bumpers: With more robust designs or specific accessories.
Customized Mudguards: With stickers or phrases that refer to “Borges Batateiro” or the world of cargo transportation (such as “God Makes Things Happen,” “Only Gold,” “Boiadeiro,” etc.).
Wheels and Tires: Wheel and tire options that give a more “arched” or heavy-duty look, typical of Brazilian roads
PX antennas, owls, auxiliary lights, and other accessories: To give the truck a more realistic and customized touch.
Rumble and Horns: It’s common for the mod to come with realistic Mercedes-Benz 1620 engine sounds, including “direct” roars and characteristic horns, such as the “Tarzan horn.”
Detailed Cabin: Cabin interior with details that mimic real trucks, such as the dashboard, original steering wheel, or optional sport steering wheels (GTI), and sometimes even the option of having a “chauffeur” (driver) in the passenger seat.
Chassis Options: Generally offers different chassis configurations, such as 4×2 and 6×2 (truck).
Engines and Transmissions: Various engine options (including “chip-fit” or “direct-drive”) and transmissions to simulate different power outputs and behaviors.
Compatibility with Rigid/Invisible Loads: Because it is a “toco” (simple chassis) or “truck” (chassis with a second axle at the rear), it is often used with invisible loads or rigid trailers mods, which allow cargo to be transported directly on the truck bed, simulating a box truck, car carrier, or loose cargo.

Where to Find the Mod:
You can find the “1620 Borges Batateiro” mod on several channels and websites specializing in ETS2 mods. Many Brazilian YouTubers who play ETS2 make demonstration videos and provide download links.
It’s important to always download mods from trusted sources to ensure the security of your game and avoid compatibility issues or malicious files. Channels and websites of well-known content creators in the ETS2 community are generally good options.
Have you ever played a Brazilian truck mod in ETS2?

Credits: batateiro

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Pack Cegonheiro Três-Eixos v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | July 14, 2025

Pack Cegonheiro Três-Eixos v1.0 ETS2

This pack adds the Três-Eixos brand’s line of tow trucks to your game. With a wide range of accessories, you can customize your trailer to your liking, including paint, taillights, and lighting.
This pack also includes a traffic mod, adding some variations to ETS2’s traffic, and I also bring you the freight market.
For those who don’t know, the freight market is a game mode where you don’t need your own trailer; just go to the company and choose my trailers, which will be there with various skins.
I also have SkinEdit, so with a simple image editor and a specific program, you can create your own skins and play with them.

Credits: tonho nunes

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Pack Boiadeira Frota Brasil v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | July 14, 2025

Pack Boiadeira Frota Brasil v1.0 ETS2

This pack adds the Boiadeira line from Frota Brasil (a Paraná-based company) to your game. With a wide range of variations, you can customize your Boiadeira from a 2-axle trailer to a 30-meter road train.
This pack also includes a traffic mod, adding some Boiadeira variants to ETS2’s traffic. I also bring you the freight market.
For those who don’t know, the freight market is a game mode where you don’t need your own trailer. Simply go to the company and choose from the available trailers. You’ll find Vine, B-train, and Simple.
We also have SkinEdit, so you can create your own skins and play with them using a simple image editor and a dedicated program.

Credits: tonho nunes

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.
